During this pandemic, no group has been as infantilized by our government as those in LTC/Congregate care. The essential family caregivers are treated as nefariously motivated virus spreaders and the residents as prisoners. I still can’t believe this is happening FOUR MONTHS IN.

DEATHS IN THE COMMUNITY: Arizona's largest county has a chart of where deaths are.   The gray bars show deaths outside LTC facilities.   56% of deaths have been in LTC facilities, the rest are deaths in the community.   I remember a time when LTC facilities were > 70%.  https://t.co/B8Xb7g0wGw

I just got off a very promising call...can’t talk details yet but LTC/RH/Congregate families....(and you know I don’t say this lightly), there is 💡 at the end of the tunnel. Keep fighting/sharing your story but also know I’m working on something with some special people.

Today the Premier left Question Period as I was asking him about his govt response to COVID-19 in Ontario’s LTC homes.   When was the Premier first made aware of the critical situation in our LTC homes & why was the Minister’s requests for additional funding in LTC rejected?  https://t.co/OIojo2VaGX

This is not new for Canada.   Harris' government reduced the public role in long term care (LTC), relaxing regulations and lessening public oversight.  He then help start a profitable private LTC business.   More than 80% of #COVID19 deaths are in LTC.   https://t.co/7SJTwgUfix

@jfinn1971 @l_stone So Mike Harris doesn't sit on the board for privatized LTC and his wife isn't invested in them then? LTC has been an issue long before covid19. Covid19 just allowed it to be highlighted is all. It has been known about since the Harris days. You just haven't paid attention.
